body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved        Park volunteers assisting with an artillery firing demostration            The Sherrick Farm   NPS Centennial   In 2016, the National Park Service will celebrate our 100th Anniversary. There are many events planned to recognize this important event and there are many ways to become part of the celebration.          Detail of the Irish Brigade monument at Antietam National Battlefield    Volunteer There are many ways to help out by volunteering at Antietam National Battlefield.          Dunker Church at Antietam National Battlefield   Planning There is something always going on at the battlefield. Visit our planning section to see what projects we are working on.          Worm fence along Bloody Lane   Support Visit this page for information on donations.
title: Antietam National Battlefield: Get Involved
